Squid Cone

It's not dripping, it's squirting

Cool down on those hot summer days with a relatively cool Squid Cone!

(California Residents: Your state laws concerning “proper handling” and “safe cooking”, enforced on us by your liberal overlords, force us to keep the Squid Cone at a constant temperature not to fall below 36 degrees)

  • Temperature range: -21-36 degrees
  • Fun Facts: Squid Cones fell out of favor after the squid shortage of 1953
  • Category: Squid, Cone, Messy, Treat

Squid 3-ways

When you eat squid, do you wanna get fingered, or do you wanna get fucked?

Here’s some squid 3-way jokes

  • Calories: Unknown
  • Deaths: 12 (11 confirmed*)
  • Category: Squid, Tower, Yummy

Leaning Tower of Squid

(formerly Leaning Tower of Flaming Squid)

Come round to Calamari Tim’s for our Leaning Tower of Flaming Squid, but make sure you’re super duper extra hungry! This tower of squid weighs in at 43lbs, and is 14ft tall (that’s 4.25 meters for our friends in the backwards lands of socialism). Currently, the only tower of squid officially sanctioned by the WHO!

  • Calories: Unknown
  • Deaths: 12* (11 confirmed)
  • Category: Squid, Tower, Yummy

Waffled Squid

(currently unavailable)

Waffled Squid made it’s way to C.T’s about 13 years ago on a trip to Fresno, CA. After partaking in the local customs, I woke up, still fueled by my 3 day meth binge, with a hunger. It was only later during my trial watching security footage was I reminded of my love of waffle fries. That day, after serving 3 years with good behavior, Squid Waffles were born.

  • Calories: Unknown
  • Deaths: 12 (11 confirmed*)
  • Category: Squid, Tower, Yummy

How it began

The salty tale of our deep seated hatred of all things Squid

  • 1997

    The Road Trip

    The fateful day started out much like any other. A day filled with joy, meth, and laughter…

  • 1997-2001

    Rage Induced Coma

    Tim was induced into a coma seemingly by his hatred of squid alone…

  • 2002

    Calamari Tim's is born

    After Tim settled his lawsuit with the state…

  • 2002-(ongoing)

    Calamari Tim's vs. Tim's Calamari

    Let’s face facts, Tim’s Calamari is fucking garbage…
